description: Returns information about human loops, given the specified parameters. If a human loop was deleted, it will not be included.

parameters.name: FlowDefinitionArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of a flow definition.

nested_items.name: HumanLoopSummaries
nested_items.description: An array of objects that contain information about the human loops.

nested_items.name: HumanLoopName
nested_items.description: The name of the human loop.

nested_items.name: HumanLoopStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the human loop.

nested_items.name: CreationTime
nested_items.description: When Amazon Augmented AI created the human loop.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the human loop failed. A failure reason is returned when the status of the human loop is Failed.

nested_items.name: FlowDefinitionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the flow definition used to configure the human loop.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: A token to display the next page of results.
